item.title: Grass has been ripped. Debris left over foot path, 30th September
item.description:

item.title: Environment concern, 30th September
item.description:
Large amount of household furniture dumped on front garden outside property. I have been informed the occupant is disabled and so may not have the ability to remove items. It has been a eyesore for months now opposite the childrens play park and nursery. Also since the rubbish being there seems to have encouraged more people to discarded of unwanted items. Please could you sort this out asap.thank you. Concerned neighbours.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1,3, Imperial Way, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Daily domestic & restaurant waste including cadboard packing, 30th September
item.description:
THE PAVEMENT IS BLACK WITH GREASE THAT IS NEVER CLEANED BY THE TAKEAWAY, WINGS & WRAPS. DANGEROUS TO WALK ON. THE TAKEAWAY LEAVES ITS COMMERCIAL FOOD WASTE OUTSIDE AT ANY TIME OF DAY. AS WELL AS BOXES & CARDBOARD THAT COULD BE RECYCLED. THE 4 FLARS AT 34a NEXT DOOR ADD TO THIS WITH DOMESTIC RUBBISH BAGS AT ALL TIMES, NOT JUST ON THE REGULAR DUSTBIN DAYS. THIS HAS BEEN GOING ON FOR YEARS. PLEASE STOP THEM AND ARRANGE FOR THE PAVEMENT TO BE CLEANED THOROUGHLY TO PREVENT ACCIDENTS
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Robertson Street, Clapham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Belson Road, Charlton Riverside, London

item.title: Holes in bottom of Telegraph Pole - Blenheim Rd Sidcup, 30th September
item.description:
I reported a safety issue that is in Blenheim Road in Sidcup this week last Thursday about a telegraph pole that has 6 holes around the bottom of it.These have been made by a rodent or a fox and the person l spoke to said they would deal with it that day. Its not been done and its dangerous because these holes are very deep and very close to the telegraph pole. There is also a manhole cover that has a few holes around it.l have been around that road today Sunday and still nothing has been done. It's a health and safety issue, if this falls it could seriously injure someone or damage someone's house. This is about half way down blenheim Road Sidcup where the bend is on the left
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 25, Blenheim Road, Albany Park, Sidcup, London
Report on FixMyStreet
